_meta.author: Charley Scholz, ELEV8
_meta.coauthor: Claude 4.6 Opus, Claude Code (coding assistant), Cursor (IDE)
_meta.description: Film stock presets for creative prompt engineering

presets.name: Kodak Portra 400
presets.promptFragment: Kodak Portra 400 film stock, soft pastel tones, natural skin rendering, fine grain, warm highlights
presets.description: The gold standard portrait film — renowned for exceptionally flattering skin tones, soft pastel palette, and fine grain

characteristics.colorProfile: warm pastels, muted earth tones, natural skin rendering

presets.name: Fuji Velvia 50
presets.promptFragment: Fuji Velvia 50 slide film, hyper-saturated vivid colors, ultra-fine grain, deep contrast, rich blues and greens
presets.description: Legendary slide film famous for its extreme color saturation, vivid blues and greens, and razor-sharp detail

characteristics.colorProfile: hyper-saturated, vivid greens and blues, deep reds, punchy color

presets.name: CineStill 800T
presets.promptFragment: CineStill 800T film, tungsten-balanced, characteristic red halation around highlights, cinematic night tones
presets.description: Repurposed cinema film stock with a signature red halation glow around bright light sources, perfect for night photography

characteristics.colorProfile: tungsten-balanced, cool blues, red halation halos around highlights, cinematic teal-orange

presets.name: Kodachrome
presets.promptFragment: Kodachrome film, rich saturated warm colors, deep shadows, iconic mid-century color palette, sharp detail
presets.description: The legendary Kodak slide film that defined a generation of photography — rich, warm, saturated colors with deep blacks

characteristics.colorProfile: rich warm saturation, deep reds and yellows, neutral shadows, iconic vintage color

presets.name: Ilford HP5 Plus (B&W)
presets.promptFragment: Ilford HP5 Plus black and white film, rich tonal range, visible grain texture, deep blacks, classic monochrome
presets.description: Versatile high-speed black and white film with a beautiful tonal range, pleasing grain structure, and deep rich blacks

characteristics.colorProfile: black and white, full tonal range, rich midtones, deep blacks

presets.name: Kodak Ektar 100
presets.promptFragment: Kodak Ektar 100 film, ultra-fine grain, vivid saturated color, high sharpness, punchy contrast
presets.description: The world's finest grain color negative film — ultra-sharp with vivid, saturated colors and excellent contrast

characteristics.colorProfile: vivid saturated color, punchy reds and blues, clean highlights, vibrant palette

presets.name: Bleach Bypass
presets.promptFragment: bleach bypass film processing, desaturated muted colors, increased contrast, silver-metallic sheen, gritty look
presets.description: Skipping the bleach step in film processing yields a distinctive high-contrast, desaturated, metallic look popular in cinema

characteristics.colorProfile: desaturated muted tones, silver-metallic overlay, reduced color intensity

presets.name: Cross-Processed
presets.promptFragment: cross-processed film, shifted unpredictable colors, strong color cast, high saturation, experimental look
presets.description: Deliberately processing film in the wrong chemicals produces wild color shifts, unexpected tonal changes, and a surreal palette

characteristics.colorProfile: shifted color spectrum, strong cyan-yellow or magenta-green casts, unpredictable palette

presets.name: Fuji Pro 400H
presets.promptFragment: Fuji Pro 400H film, soft pastel palette, gentle highlights, smooth skin tones, subtle cool undertone
presets.description: Beloved portrait and wedding film known for its delicate pastel palette, soft highlights, and slightly cool undertones

characteristics.colorProfile: soft pastels, cool undertones, gentle highlights, airy feel, delicate skin rendering

presets.name: Kodak Tri-X 400 (B&W)
presets.promptFragment: Kodak Tri-X 400 black and white film, dramatic contrast, pronounced grain, gritty photojournalism look
presets.description: The quintessential photojournalism film — punchy contrast, distinctive grain, and a gutsy look that defined street photography

characteristics.colorProfile: black and white, punchy contrast, bright highlights, crushed shadows, gritty texture

presets.name: Instant Film / Polaroid
presets.promptFragment: instant Polaroid film, faded soft colors, low contrast, warm vintage tint, dreamy imperfections
presets.description: The nostalgic instant film aesthetic — slightly faded, warm, imperfect, and utterly charming

characteristics.colorProfile: faded warm tones, reduced saturation, slight color shifts, dreamy vintage feel
